content:
TITLE: Cloning and Setting up the Elevate Theme Repository
DESCRIPTION: Commands for cloning the Elevate theme repository and installing dependencies. This is the first step to start working with the theme source code.
SOURCE: https://github.com/hubspot/cms-elevate-theme-public/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git clone [repository-url]
cd cms-elevate-theme-public
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Dependencies for Elevate Theme
DESCRIPTION: Commands to install all necessary dependencies for the Elevate theme and its workspaces using either npm or yarn.
SOURCE: https://github.com/hubspot/cms-elevate-theme-public/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run npm-install:all
# or
yarn yarn-install:all
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Initializing HubSpot CLI Configuration
DESCRIPTION: Command to initialize and configure the HubSpot CLI for local development with your HubSpot portal.
SOURCE: https://github.com/hubspot/cms-elevate-theme-public/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
hs init
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building and Uploading the Elevate Theme
DESCRIPTION: Commands to build the theme for production and upload it to your HubSpot portal in one operation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/hubspot/cms-elevate-theme-public/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run build-upload
# or
yarn build-upload
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Starting the Development Server for Elevate Theme
DESCRIPTION: Commands to start the local development server for real-time preview of changes to the Elevate theme.
SOURCE: https://github.com/hubspot/cms-elevate-theme-public/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run npm-start
# or
yarn yarn-start
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Elevate Theme Project Structure Representation
DESCRIPTION: Directory structure of the Elevate theme project, showing the organization of files and folders including modules, components, templates, and configuration files.
SOURCE: https://github.com/hubspot/cms-elevate-theme-public/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
├── src/
│   └── unified-theme/         # Main theme directory
│       ├── _locales/          # Localization files
│       ├── assets/            # Theme assets
│       ├── components/        # React components
│       │   ├── modules/       # Theme modules (e.g., Accordion, Button, Card)
│       │   │   └── ImageAndText/  # Example module structure
│       │   │       ├── index.tsx
│       │   │       ├── types.ts
│       │   │       └── styles.ts
│       │   ├── fieldLibrary/  # Field components for module fields
│       │   ├── utils/         # Utility helpers
│       │   ├── types/         # TypeScript type definitions
│       │   └── ButtonComponent/  # Example shared component consumed by modules
│       │       └── index.tsx
│       ├── helpers/          # Helper functions and utilities
│       ├── images/           # Theme images
│       ├── sections/         # Theme sections
│       ├── templates/        # Theme templates
│       ├── fields.json       # Theme settings
│       ├── theme.json        # Theme configuration
│       ├── package.json      # Theme-specific dependencies
│       └── tsconfig.json     # TypeScript configuration
├── build/                    # Build configuration
├── vite.config.ts            # Vite configuration
├── package.json              # Project dependencies
└── hsproject.json            # HubSpot project configuration
```
